item.title: Summer 2012
item.description:
Chronologically,

  • Made 4-bit Webther.
  • Helped with the School of Computing Freshmen Orientation Camp.
  • Made and released Fourcast.
  • Discovered and watched both The Legend of Korra and Avatar: The Last Airbender.Â (Both of which are incredibly awesome.)
  • Took a module at school.
  • Went on a quick family vacation.

That was fun.
